resources.string: With this application you can easily toggle USB Mass Storage mode on or off for the microSD card in the device.\nYou cannot export the internal SD Card due to limitations put by Linux filesystems and the way USB Mass Storage works.\nThis application requires BusyBox, if you don\'t have it, install it from the Play Store.
Successfully set USB mode to MTP
Successfully set USB mode to USB Mass Storage mode, you should now see your SD card on your PC.
The SD card seems to be exported over USB, just making sure, did you unmount/eject the SD Card from your PC?
S3C Gadget not available in your kernel! Application disabled
The device is already in Mass Storage mode!
The device is already in MTP mode!

The microSD card failed to unmount, this is usually because an application is accessing it. You can either close the applications using the card, or force unmount it, would you like to force unmount it? (WARNING: This may cause data loss!)

USB Mass Storage for SGSIII / SGNII

Thanks to d4fseeker and Sakaschi for the methods used to enable UMS.
Unable to run command. Is BusyBox installed? Click no to install it.
Failed to run command. Please make sure your BusyBox installation has mountpoint available
